PropertyValue.Value:
SELECT blii.line_name, bsi.station_cn_name, cbri.device_id, cbri.oper_seq, case cbri.data_type when 1 then '硬币回收箱' when 2 then '硬币找零箱' when 3 then '纸币回收钱箱' when 4 then '纸币找零钱箱' when 5 then '废币回收钱箱' end data_type,
case cbri.oper_type WHEN 1 THEN '安装' WHEN 2 THEN '卸下' WHEN 3 THEN '清点' WHEN 4 THEN '补充' WHEN 5 THEN '领用' WHEN 6 THEN '归还' WHEN 7 THEN 'RFID初始化' WHEN 8 THEN '钱箱登记' WHEN 9 THEN '钱箱调出' END oper_type, case cbri.install_status WHEN '01' THEN '正常安装' WHEN '02' THEN '非法安装' WHEN '03' THEN '正常卸下' WHEN '04' THEN '非法卸下' end install_status, cbri.occur_in_datetime , cbri.occur_out_datetime, bmti.currency_name, cbri.total_money, cbri.operator_id, poi.operator_name, cbri.update_date, cbri.update_time, cbri.cash_box_id FROM cash_box_oper_info cbri LEFT JOIN basi_line_id_info blii ON blii.line_id = cbri.line_id LEFT JOIN basi_station_info bsi ON bsi.station_id = cbri.station_id LEFT JOIN cash_box_oper_detail cbod ON cbod.oper_seq = cbri.oper_seq LEFT JOIN basi_money_type_info bmti ON bmti.currency_code = cbod.currency_code LEFT JOIN priv_operator_info poi ON poi.operator_id = cbri.operator_id
